cards.rules_text:
When this creature enters, each player reveals their hand. Starting with you, each of those players may exile a nonland card revealed this way. For as long as those cards remain exiled, their owners may play them. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.
{1}{R}: This creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Flash
When this creature enters, counter target spell if its mana value is less than or equal to this creature's power.
{1}{G}: This creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

Flying
When this creature enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
{3}{W}, Exile target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard: Create tapped token that's a copy of the exiled card.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: This enchantment becomes a 3/3 blue Elemental Spirit creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.

Reach
When this creature enters, surveil 2. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Return each non-Zombie creature to its owner's hand, then each opponent discards a card at random.

cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, create a tapped Treasure token.
Once each turn, if you would sacrifice a creature to pay a cost or an effect you control would cause you to sacrifice a creature, you may sacrifice an artifact or enchantment instead.

Enchant player
When this enchantment enters, enchanted player mills three cards.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

You may look at the top card of your library any time, and you may play artifacts, enchantments and lands from the top of your library.
[i]Concord[/i] — {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact or enchantment spells. Activate only if there are four or more card types among permanents you control.

Exile target spell or nonland permanent you control and target spell or nonland permanent you don't control. For as long as those cards remains exiled, their owners may play them. Spells your opponents cast this way cost {2} more to cast.

Lifelink, haste
Whenever this creature attacks, choose one. If you control four or more creatures, you may choose both instead.
• Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance that's attacking.
• Other attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.notes:
Whenever this creature attacks, choose one. If you control five or more creatures, you may choose both instead.
:: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance that's attacking.
:: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may sacrifice a land or discard a land card. If you do, draw a card and you gain 2 life.
This creature's power is equal to the number of land cards in your graveyard.
cards.notes:
When this creature enters or attacks, surveil 1.
Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Then if you control seven or more lands, create a 5/5 black Fungus Horror creature token with "This creature can't block."

cards.rules_text: Savage creatures you control gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn, then creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn. You may transform a Werewolf you control. [i](Transformed creatures and ones with greater power than their base power are savage.)[/i]

Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Huntmaster of the Fells, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform this creature.

Whenever this creature transforms into Ravager of the Fells, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 2 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform this creature.

When this creature enters, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature card and an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Vigilance
When this creature dies, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is one plus the number of differently named instant or sorcery cards in your graveyard. Put one of those cards in your hand and the rest on the bottom in a random order. If you look at thirteen or more cards this way, you may put all of those cards into your hand instead.
Flashback {3}{U}

Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, then you may cast an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less from among the cards without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Whenever one or more Zombie cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

This creature can't block.
